channel.title: Gambler
channel.description: Is it possible to make a gambler gamble more then money? For example, in other server i see a gambler double 5m and if u win its X2. I want it so that you can gamble any item and if u win u get X2. Please Help! Thanks! :confused:

item.title: Gambler
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Just make a normal gambler, but on the payout do item amount x2…

public void payWin(int itemToPay, int amount){ giveItemMethod(itemToPay, amount * 2); }

Read full topic

item.title: Gambler
item.dc:creator: @Doing_Cho21 Doing Cho2
item.description:
@Doing_Cho21 wrote:

[quote=“MrFun, post:4, topic:535636”][quote author=Doing Cho2 link=topic=654443.msg4383745#msg4383745 date=1384481715]

yes is possible. instead of betting the money. store the item id of the item they want to bet, call delete the item, see if they win, then add the items or not.

I dont understand this ^?
[/quote]
To put it in “English” he said when betting send the gamble system to where the item id you want to gamble and if you win it will send then send the id to gamble system and double it[/quote]
Thats what im trying to do… But i dont know how.

Read full topic

yes is possible. instead of betting the money. store the item id of the item they want to bet, call delete the item, see if they win, then add the items or not.
